item.description:
Nicole has a wonderful idea of adding meetups for families, an idea I've heard from a few others but have never acted upon, until now.

The Valente Branch of the Cambridge Public Library has a Portuguese Sing-Along every Tuesday from 5-6 pm for young children and their parents/guardians. Nicole is attending the August 14 Sing-Along at 5:00 pm and has invited other parents and their child(ren) to join her. If you're interested, you can contact her at 706-MAESTRA to coordinate meeting plans.

The Valente Branch Library is located in an area between Lechmere and Inman Square, which receives many of Cambridge's new immigrants. The branch plays host to a community that includes large populations from the Portuguese speaking countries of Cape Verde, Portugal and Brazil.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Family Sing-Along
